name: Christmas Crunch Crush Lite
description:
Enjoy a match 3 game with a Christmas theme. Match twinkling Christmas lights and Christmas bulbs with serene snowflakes falling in the background. Play as long as you want with no interruptions.

Free (Lite) - Free version includes 20 levels and no ads!
Paid - Paid version includes the full 300 levels and no ads!

FEATURES

- NO ADS!

- NO IN APP PURCHASES!

- UNLIMITED LIVES!

- UNLIMITED BOOSTS!

- MERRY CHRISTMAS!


HOW TO PLAY

- Match same color Christmas lights

- Match 4 get a striped Christmas light

- Match 5 get a special blinking snowflake that can match to anything

- Special awesome snow globe boosts

- SnowBall Blast Boost lets you throw a snowball at any Christmas bulb to remove it

- Switch Boost allows you to switch the position of 2 different color bulbs or lights


THE MOST WONDERFUL CHRISTMAS GAME!

Don't hesitate, it's good, download it today:)
